process: I collaborated with Marwan Pablo on the official artwork and visualizer for his track “EL HALAL” The artwork began as a self-portrait project that caught his attention and was later chosen as the official cover. I also designed and produced the visualizer, creating a dynamic visual experience that matched the track’s mood and energy. This project showcased my ability to merge personal creativity with professional execution, delivering visuals that resonated with both the artist and his audience.

process: I worked on the VFX for the Ghada Abdelrazik X Ménage07 campaign, a project built around bold elegance and a cinematic, high-fashion atmosphere The concept of the ad revolves around showcasing Ghada in a world where luxury meets attitude sharp movements, dramatic lighting, and a confident presence that defines the collaboration. My role was to enhance that world visually adding subtle yet powerful VFX touches that elevate the mood without overshadowing the performance.

process: As a VFX Artist, my journey with the advertisement for Geo by People & Places in collaboration with SDWorks was a defining experience. I stepped into the project with a clear mission: to craft and integrate visual effects that would elevate the narrative and bring the story’s world to life.
bio: From the first concept frames to the final render, I worked to ensure every effect blended seamlessly into the visuals, enhancing the atmosphere, enriching the storytelling, and supporting the emotional tone of the ad. It was a process of precision, creativity, and constant refinement turning ideas into immersive moments that expanded the world of Geo.

process: worked on developing the brand identity for Blitz from the very beginning starting with the rational and the core concept behind the brand, all the way to executing the full identity.
bio: Blitz targets a bold, fearless generation of young people who seek a luxurious lifestyle and want to stand out. That’s where the story began: understanding the audience, shaping the brand’s personality, and crafting a visual identity that embodies the ambition, elegance, and bold spirit that define Blitz.
